thread.title: ‘Nate means a lot to us’ | Cocke County community rallies behind autistic man, hoping to get him a home
thread.title_full: ‘Nate means a lot to us’ | Cocke County community rallies behind autistic man, hoping to get him a home

author: @wvlt
title: ‘Nate means a lot to us’ | Cocke County community rallies behind autistic man, hoping to get him a home
text: Updated: 1 hour ago Coastal Carolina officially introduced new men’s basketball coach Justin Gray on Thursday. [Lawsuit claims Grand Strand restaurant hired man later convicted of deadly shooting despite criminal history](/video/2024/03/15/lawsuit-claims-grand-strand-restaurant-hired-man-later-convicted-deadly-shooting-despite-criminal-history/) Updated: 1 hour ago The estate of a man killed in a shooting outside a North Myrtle Beach-area restaurant is filing suit, accusing the restaurant of hiring the man who pulled the trigger despite a “tendency for violence.” Updated: 1 hour ago The Dothan Fire Department and Southeast Health Foundation are announcing the launch of the PulsePoint app in Dothan. Updated: 1 hour ago Lumberton police responded to an attempted carjacking that turned deadly on Thursday, according to the Lumberton Emergency Communications. Updated: 1 hour ago Lauren Blaylock said she’s taking one day at a time and reflecting on her favorites memories with her mom, Kristin Laymon, who authorities believe was murdered at the Club Wyndham on Ocean Boulevard in North Myrtle Beach back in September. Updated: 1 hour ago The budget also includes a 5% salary increase for current city staff.

organizations.name: the dothan fire department and southeast health foundation
